info.name: fo_74_verify_to_create_bill
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to create new bill include product

###### Steps:

1. Login
    
    1. Login owner account => get token
        
    2. Verify token => get business_id
        
    3. Get business detail => get branch_idd
        
2. Get data
    
    1. contact / get list contact => get all list & random 1 on them (bao gồm tổng thu và tổng chi) \[NEW\] get phải thu, phải trả
        
    2. COA account / get list account => save internal_account_obj (credit_account, discount_account)
        
    3. account cash_n_bank / get list bank account => use to create bill with payment method bank_transfer
        
    4. product / get list product => save all products (link with coa)
        
    5. tax / get list tax => get a tax (the same with coa-tax)
        
    6. posting / get list posting => get all with type (debit/credit)
        
    7. home-report / get report account receivable - card unpaid (lifetime) => get list respective with every option(s)
        
    8. home-report / get report account receivable - customer => get data with 5 options (due, less, between, over and total)
        
    9. home-report / get report expense => get data
        
    10. bill / get list bill => get bill matching with finan_status & status to edit
        
3. Check bill
    
4. Create DRAFT bill
    
    1. Unhappy case: items = \[\]
        
    2. Unhappy case: missing customer
        
    3. Unhappy case: customer with email is wrong format
        
    4. Unhappy case: missing order_code (free rule)
        
    5. Unhappy case: order_code is existed
        
    6. Unhappy case: due_date < create_date
        
    7. Unhappy case: tax_type = ""
        
    8. Unhappy case: status = ""
        
    9. Unhappy case: payment_menthod = ""
        
    10. Happy case: successful
        
5. Check data
    
    1. bill / list bill => new bill with correct data
        
    2. bill / bill detail => had bill with correct data
        
    3. ~~buyer bill / buyer view bill detail~~
        
    4. \[New\] contact / get list contact => check phải thu, phải trả nothing happen
        
    5. posting / list posting => nothing happen
        
    6. home-report / get report account receivable - card unpaid => check data
        
    7. home-report / get report account receivable - customer => check data
        
    8. home-report / get report expense => check data
        
    9. Check bill
        
6. Create ACTIVE bill
    
    1. Happy case: successful
        
7. Check data
    
    1. bill / list bill => new bill with correct data
        
    2. bill / bill detail => had bill with correct data
        
    3. ~~buyer bill / buyer view bill detail => check data correctly~~
        
    4. \[New\] contact / get list contact => check phải thu, phải trả nothing happen
        
    5. account / account detail => update correctly (check all account relation with this bill)
        
    6. posting / list posting => have new correctly record(s) & data correctly
        
    7. home-report / get report account receivable - card unpaid => check data
        
    8. home-report / get report account receivable - customer => check data
        
    9. home-report / get report expense => check data
        

###### Note:
